Package stores

Class BranchMenuItemStorage

Object
BranchMenuItemStorage
public class BranchMenuItemStorage extends Object
Manages the storage of BranchMenuItem objects, using serialization to persist data. Provides functionality to add, remove, update, and retrieve menu items. It also manages unique categories of menu items. All methods and fields are static.

    • add

      public static void add(BranchMenuItem branchMenuItem)
      Adds a BranchMenuItem to the storage.
      Parameters:
      branchMenuItem - the BranchMenuItem to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the branchMenuItem is null or if a menu item with the same ID already exists.

      Removes a BranchMenuItem from the storage.
      Parameters:
      branchMenuItem - the BranchMenuItem to remove

    • update

      public static void update(BranchMenuItem branchMenuItem)
      Updates an existing BranchMenuItem in the storage.
      Parameters:

      public static BranchMenuItem get(int itemID)
      Retrieves a BranchMenuItem by its item ID.
      Parameters:
      itemID - the ID of the menu item
      Returns:
      the BranchMenuItem if found, or null if not

      Returns all BranchMenuItem objects stored in the storage.

      Serializes and saves all BranchMenuItem objects to a file.
